description:
Today`s theme is "What is a mental clinic like?" We`ll explain in easy-to-understand detail what a mental clinic is actually like!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mental Clinic tte Dou Iu Tokoro?
Quel genre d’endroit est une clinique psychiatrique ?
What Kind of Place Is a Mental Clinic?
メンタルクリニックってどういうところ?
